name: devote
description: üåç To empower communities worldwide by providing a secure, transparent, and decentralized voting platform that fosters trust and inclusivity in decision-making processes.

scripts.install:all: yarn --cwd Frontend install && (cd Backend && scarb fetch)
scripts.build:all: yarn run build:frontend && yarn run build:backend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.test:all: echo 'No test script defined for Frontend' && npm run test:backend
